name: Herb Roasted Pork
author: WENDEE_H
summary: Herb-rubbed roasted pork loin with a sweet, tangy glaze.
directions: Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C)
In a bowl, combine sage, salt, pepper, and garlic
Place pork in an uncovered roasting pan on the middle oven rack
Bake in the preheated oven approximately 3 hours, or until the internal temperature reaches at least 145 degrees F (63 degrees C), depending upon your desired doneness
Meanwhile, place sugar, cornstarch, vinegar, water, and soy sauce in a small saucepan
Heat, stirring occasionally, until mixture begins to bubble and thicken slightly
Brush roast with glaze 3 or 4 times during the last 1/2 hour of cooking
Pour remaining glaze over roast, and serve
